column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Always phenomenal food. During Covid they were the best nice restaurant to order takeout from. All food was prepped so well. For example
column2: they intentionally undercooked the steak slightly so that while it was sitting in the box on the way to my house I wouldn't end up with overcoooked steak. Most places do not account for that. That's the kind of attention to detail I appreciate and the food and service is always excellent.
